landing-page-radio.required: Select an option below and press continue

dateOfBirth.default: Enter your date of birth in the correct format; for example, 31 10 1990
dateOfBirth.before: Enter a date that is in the past

building.default: Enter details of your building and street

townOrCity.regex: Enter a town or city without including digits

incomeTypes.default: Select all options that apply to you.

countryOfHearing.default: Select where the appeal hearing is to be held

countrySelect.default: Enter a valid country of residence

email.default: Enter your email address in the correct format

int-phone-number.internationalPhoneNumber: Enter a valid international phone number

complaintDetails.default: Enter details about why you are making a complaint

appealStages.required: Select an appeal stage from the list

amountWithUnitSelect.default: Enter the amount in the correct format; for example, 10 Litres
amountWithUnitSelect.alphanum: The amount must not contain any special characters
amountWithUnitSelect.required: Enter an amount and a unit value

amountWithUnitSelect-unit.default: A valid value must be selected as the amount unit
amountWithUnitSelect-unit.required: A unit must be selected for the amount

amountWithUnitSelect-amount.required: An amount must be selected with the unit
